definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Therefore, if you want to renovate your old home then don?
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果你想你的舊家翻新，然後穿上？

sentences.english: Here are some tips to help you move out of your old home.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一些提示，以幫助你走出你的舊家。

sentences.english: We think that the bulk of these extra CFCs are coming from things like old fridges.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲這大量多餘的氟氯碳化物來自舊家店。

definition: postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
